indicator.summary: ConnorsRSI is a composite oscillator that incorporates RSI, winning/losing streaks, and percentile gain metrics on scale of 0 to 100. See documentation for more information.
indicator.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
indicator.param: Number of periods in the RSI.
Number of periods for streak RSI.
Number of periods for the percentile ranking.
indicator.returns: Time series of ConnorsRSI, RSI, Streak RSI, and Percent Rank values.
